#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mod1 10000
typedef long long ll;
ll ctl[1111];
int main()
{
    ll test;
    ctl[0]=1;
    ctl[1]=1;
    ll i, j;
    for(i=2;i<=1111;i++)
    {
        for(j=0;j<i;j++)
        {
            ctl[i]=ctl[i]+(ctl[j]*ctl[i-1-j]);
            ctl[i]%=mod1;
        }
    }
    scanf("%lld", &test);
    while(test--)
    {
        ll n;
        scanf("%lld", &n);
        if(n<=1)
            cout<<0<<endl;
        else
            printf("%lld\n", ctl[n-1]);
    }
    return 0;
}
